import React, { Component } from "react"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { bindActionCreators } from "redux"; import { Container, Row, Col } from "reactstrap"; import Form from "react-bootstrap/Form"; import Button from "react-bootstrap/Button"; import Card from "react-bootstrap/Card"; import Select from "react-select"; import ListGroup from "react-bootstrap/ListGroup"; import DayPickerInput from "react-day-picker/DayPickerInput"; import CurrencyInput from "react-currency-input"; const scaryAnimals = [ { label: "Alligators", value: 1 }, { label: "Crocodiles", value: 2 }, { label: "Sharks", value: 3 }, { label: "Small crocodiles", value: 4 }, { label: "Smallest crocodiles", value: 5 }, { label: "Snakes", value: 6 } ]; class IncluirMovimentacao extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); } state = { listitems: [ { name: "shashank", age: 20 }, { name: "vardan", age: 30 }, { name: "somya", age: 40 } ], value: "", NumeroDocumento: "", amount: 0.0 }; getInitialState() { return { amount: "0.00" }; } handleChange = event => { this.setState({ amount: event.target.value }); }; render() { return (

console.log(day)} /> console.log(day)} /> console.log(day)} /> console.log(day)} /> console.log(day)} /> console.log(day)} /> console.log(day)} /> console.log(day)} />
); } } function mapDispatchToProps(dispatch) { return bindActionCreators({}, dispatch); } export default connect(null, mapDispatchToProps)(IncluirMovimentacao);
